objects.text:
• SmartGRID Technology
• Adjustable Lumbar Support
• Ergonomic Design

The Sleep Company Onyx
Orthopedic Office Chair
TWO FOR THE PRICE OF ONE!

product_details.name: The Sleep Company Onyx Orthopedic Office Chair | Patented SmartGRID Technology | Adjustable Lumbar Support for Ergonomic Sitting Posture | High Back Office Chair for Work, Home, Study | Black
product_details.description: Brand: The Sleep Company. Colour: Black. Material: SmartGRID. Product Dimensions: 48D x 62W x 117H Centimeters. Size: High Back. Back Style: Solid Back. Special Feature: Adjustable Lumbar, Adjustable Height, Adjustable Arm Rest, Rolling, Adjustable Headrest, Adjustable Height, Ergonomic, Adjustable Tilt Control. Product Care Instructions: Wipe Clean. Net Quantity: 1.00 count. Seat Material Type: SmartGRID. Recommended Uses For Product: Office. Pattern: Black. Finish Type: Chrome Finish. Room Type: Living Room, Office, Meeting Room. Age Range (Description): Adult. Shape: Ergonomic. Model Name: SmartGRID Onyx Black. Arm Style: With Arm Rest. Surface Recommendation: Hard Floor. Seat Back Interior Height: 31 Inches. Furniture Finish: Black. Seat Height: 23 Inches. Seat Depth: 48.3 Centimeters. Fill Material: Patented SmartGRID. Seat Length: 25 Inches. Form Factor: Medium Firm. Country of Origin: India. Item Weight: 22 kg. Generic Name: Adjustable.

banner_details:
This banner is a promotional creative featuring a modern office chair and communicates a compelling "Buy One Get One Free" offer. The layout is vertically split into two halves— the left panel showcases marketing text and CTAs on a navy-blue background with geometric highlights, while the right panel exclusively displays a high-quality image of the chair on a neutral gray grid backdrop. The primary headline is emphasized using a bold, white sans-serif font (`heading`), followed by a futuristic-blue tagline (`tagline`) and a bullet list of product benefits (`features`). The product name (`product_name`), a call-out deal (`subheading`), eye-catching pricing (`price`), and an orange rectangular CTA box (`cta_button` and `cta`) drive conversions. A small legal disclaimer (`disclaimer`) is at the bottom.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: `#1a3a5f`
- Bright Blue: `#3399ff`
- Deep Blue: `#105899`
- Sky Blue: `#0066cc`
- Light Gray: `#f9f9f9`
- Charcoal Gray: `#5a5a5a`
- Orange: `#ff6600`
- White: `#ffffff`
product_color: The product image features a modern ergonomic office chair with a sleek, professional aesthetic. The primary color is matte black (#1C1C1C), used for the chair's structure, backrest, armrests, and base, conveying elegance and durability. Vibrant electric blue (#007BFF) accents, seen in the hexagonal gel padding on the backrest and seat, contrast sharply against the black, drawing attention and emphasizing comfort and innovation. These blue inserts are highlighted using subtle gradient blending with sky blue (#4DA6FF) and light cyan (#B3E5FC), giving a dynamic, tech-inspired look. This palette is ideal for marketing banners targeting productivity, comfort, and modern workspace design.
